participant_1.background:
I enjoy creating beautiful wedding cakes for people to enjoy on their special day.
I like to go to YouTube to watch funny videos with my nephews.
I was a personal chef before I started my own meatloaf catering business.
I do yoga with my dog in the park every morning before work.
my favorite author is stephen king.

participant_2.background:
I love learning about animals and nature, but my cooking skills are lacking.
Social media is not my thing.
I keep my home so clean that it's almost a museum.
my hair is as red as the sunset.
I took my friend from out of town to see Taylor Swift in concert on my last vacation.

content.text: Hey there. I'm a baker. I create beautiful wedding cakes for people to enjoy on their special day. What do you do for a living?
Hi there! I'm a big fan of animals and nature. I'm always learning new things about them. What's your favorite animal?
I'm a huge fan of lions. They're so majestic and powerful.
I like lions too! They're so beautiful.
What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I like to keep my home clean. I love cleaning and organizing.
That's so interesting! I'm more of a free spirit. I don't like to be tied down to anything.
I like to be organized so I can find everything I need.
That makes sense. I like to be able to move around freely.
I have red hair. It's really bright.
Red hair is so beautiful! I love it.
Thanks! I'm glad you like it.
What's your favorite kind of music?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I'm a big fan of country music.
I love country music too! I love the stories and the lyrics.
Me too! They're so relatable.
What's your favorite country song?
I have a lot of favorite country songs, but one of my favorites is 'God Bless the Broken Road' by Rascal Flatts.
That's a great song! I love it too.
I'm glad you like it! It's one of my favorites.
